title: The Judgment of Solomon
medium: etching and aquatint printed in red-brown ink on laid paper
dimensions: sheet: 27.1 × 21.5 cm (10 11/16 × 8 7/16 in.) cut within platemark
attribution: Cornelis Ploos van Amstel (editor) and Cornelis Brouwer (printmaker), after Jan de Bisschop (formerly Nicolaes de Bruyn; formerly Lucas van Leyden)
creditline: Gift of Sherwood B. Smith, Jr.
